knimeNode.name: Append Variable To Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts scope variables and appends them to an input table.

fullDescription.intro: Extracts scope variables that are carried along the flow and appends them to an input table.
fullDescription.option: Select the variables that should be provided in the output table.

ports.dataOut: The input table with additional columns, one for each selected variable. All values in the new column will be the same.
